story_arceus_04_06000/2401_1101_0200_20:
Alder was going around Pasio, teaching
people about the importance of being with
Pokémon, just like always...
story_arceus_04_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hey, hey! Alder! Who’s stronger—you or a
Neo Champion?
story_arceus_04_06000/2401_1001_0600_10: Care to lend me a hand?
